title: Relationship between the Individual and Society

content.question: Write an essay that argues your position on Sanders’ ideas about the relationship between the individual and society in the United States.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that argues your position on Sanders’ ideas about the relationship between the individual and society in the United States.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
